name: Who the hell is Tom?
description:
What makes a person what he/she is? Are we defined by our goals in life? By our past? Or are we just a bunch of random opinions and choices put together?

Get inside Tom's mind, navigate through his thoughts and see if you can get to know him. Things might not make sense in some areas, the human mind still remains a mystery and sometimes not even Tom knows who the hell Tom is.

INPUT: Use the mouse to interact with the game. Press "R" to restart if you find a bug and get stuck.

NOTE: This game was made over 48h for the #familiargamejam5 . Theme was "deconstruction"

@ludipe & @albert_composer
